ThingDef.label: Infantry Autogun MKV
ThingDef.description: Infantry autoguns are prized for their high rate of fire, and ability of crit shot.

ThingDef.label: Ius Shredder Autopistol Mk III
ThingDef.description: Infantry autoguns are prized for their high rate of fire, and ability of crit shot.

ThingDef.label: Zarona Quickdraw Stub Revolver
ThingDef.description: One of the most ancient pistol designs, stub revolvers endure across myriad frontier worlds thanks to their durability, simplicity and effectiveness.

ThingDef.label: Agripinaa Quickdraw Stub Revolver
ThingDef.description: A surprisingly weighty, high-calibre pistol, the stopping power of an Agripinaa stub revolver belies its compact size.

ThingDef.label: Agripinaa Braced Autogun Mk VIII
ThingDef.description: Exchanging the iron sights of the better known Agripinaa autogun for a heavy stock and counter-balanced barrel, this weapon is well-suited for mowing down hordes of foes.

ThingDef.label: Locke MKIIb Spearhead Boltgun
ThingDef.description: Locke-pattern boltguns are known for their reliability and stopping power.

ThingDef.label: Locke Mk III Spearhead Boltgun
ThingDef.description: Boasting a sleeker design than the Mk IIb, the Locke Mk III nonetheless does not compromise on power.

ThingDef.label: Godwyn-Branx Mk IV Bolt Pistol
ThingDef.description: This human-portable weapon still carries a terrifying punch, provided by the high-calibre mass reactive shells loaded into its clip.

ThingDef.label: Agripinaa Combat Shotgun
ThingDef.description: This semi-automatic shotgun is deadly at short range.It can also load a solid slug for high-accuracy shot

ThingDef.label: Kantrael Combat Shotgun
ThingDef.description: Loads the shotgun with one Incendiary Shell that applies Burning to enemies

ThingDef.label: Headhunter Autogun
ThingDef.description: Headhunter autoguns are highly accurate, modified for high-accuracy takedowns.

ThingDef.label: Lucius Mk III Helbore Lasgun
ThingDef.description: The Helbore patterns hailing from Lucius are capable of charging up for high-damage shots.

ThingDef.label: Kantrael MG XII Infantry Lasgun
ThingDef.description: With its improved charge pack and focusing array, the MG XII is amongst the most powerful lasguns to come out of the manufactorums of Kantrael

ThingDef.label: Accatran Mk VId Recon Lasgun
ThingDef.description: This recon pattern is a lighter carbine with a high rate of fire but low damage per shot

ThingDef.label: Plasma Gun
ThingDef.description: The weapon fires a highly energized ball of hydrogen-based plasma.Emergency cooling ducts and exhaust vents periodically expel excess heat from the gun while stoping charging device working; if these are overwhelmed by continuous fire the wielder may be harmed by emergency venting.

ThingDef.label: Twin-Linked Heavy Stubber MkV
ThingDef.description: Heavy stubbers are projectile weapons similar in appearance and effect to an M2-era heavy machine gun, firing large-calibre bullets able to stop a man dead in his tracks. They are inferior in penetration to a boltgun (being stopped by anything heavier than Flak armour) they compensate through sheer volume of fire.

ThingDef.label: Lorenz Kickback
ThingDef.description: Utilizes a single giant cartridge to inflict devastation either to hordes or single targets.

ThingDef.label: Lorenz Rumbler
ThingDef.description: An Ogryn-sized single grenade launcher.

ThingDef.label: Blastoom Mk III Grenadier Gauntlet
ThingDef.description: Grenades can be launched with relative precision once a wielder braces and aims. Otherwise it makes an excellent club.

ThingDef.label: AchlysHeavy Stubber Mk II
ThingDef.description: The complicated accelerator mechanism that surrounds the barrel of this weapon helps propel the massive ammunition to incredible speeds. This, predictably, results in a bigger bang and more destruction. Understandably, this pleases the Ogryns.

ThingDef.label: Exaction Mk III Exterminator Shotgun
ThingDef.description: This shotgun's wide horizontal pellet spread is tailored to wipe out entire crowds of heretics. If the target is particularly tough, the electric shells will ensure that they cannot resist.

ThingDef.label: Exaction Mk VIII Exterminator Shotgun
ThingDef.description: This shotgun's wide horizontal pellet spread is tailored to wipe out entire crowds of heretics. If the target is particularly tough, the electric shells will ensure that they cannot resist.

ThingDef.label: Artemia Mk III Purgation Flamer
ThingDef.description: Hailing from the same forge world as the mighty Hellhound flame tank, this weapon uses volatile promethium to scour heretics with fire.

ThingDef.label: Judgement Mk IV Subductor Shotpistol and Riot Shield
ThingDef.description: A Riot Shield and a short Shotpistol are perfect for the tight, cramped halls where the Arbites often find themselves.
